mapper.insert: insert into question(questionnaire_id, order_number, title, type, is_required, is_private) values (#{questionnaireId}, #{orderNumber}, #{title}, #{type}, #{isRequired}, #{isPrivate})
mapper.select: select id, questionnaire_id, order_number, title, type, is_required, is_private from question where questionnaire_id = #{questionnaireId} order by id
